title: PSX Tekken 3 Restyled Edition [ENG][IMG]
description:
Tekken 3 Restyled Edition , a new edition of the popular game Tekken 3 Changes from the original are to change the form of 35 skins . See here refreshed versions of characters from T3 , as well as new faces like Kazuya , Spider -Man and Iron Man . So it 's not a joke , the game will feature two characters are not related to a series Tekken ! I hope that the effort put into selecting and placing the skins will be appreciated by you , and Tekken 3 Restyled Edition you 'll like it ;) I plan to continue to work on the T3 Restyled Edition also perhaps soon will be an improved version . Below is a list of pozamienianych form , along with a number of clothing that is changed , and what button to select the number of the outfit :

Square P1 = P2 = X , P3 = Triangle
